net.proteusframework.cms.component.content

Class ContentBuilder<PE extends Enum<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.cms.component.content.ContentBuilder<PE>
  • Type Parameters:
    PE - the Property enumeration type.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProxyServerModel, SocialLoginContentBuilder

    public class ContentBuilder<PE extends Enum<?>>
extends Object
    Content builder for ContentElement.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

      • isTreatEmptyStringAsNull

        public boolean isTreatEmptyStringAsNull()
        Get the TreatEmptyStringAsNull flag. This means that properties set to empty string will be treated as if they were null.
        Returns:

      • isXMLEqual

        public static boolean isXMLEqual(String oldData,
                                 String newData)
        Test if the XML is the same.
        Parameters:
        oldData - the old XML.
        newData - the new XML.
        Returns:
        true or false. This will also return false if the input is bad.

      • load

        public static <T extends ContentBuilder<?>> T load(@Nullable
                                                   CmsModelDataSet cbds,
                                                   Class<? extends T> subClass,
                                                   boolean useCache)
        Load the content builder from the specified data.

        NOTE: Instances of CmsModelDataSet for rendering should always be retrieved from a CmsRequest instead of ContentElement.getDataVersions() or ContentElement.getPublishedData().

        Type Parameters:
        T - the subclass type.
        Parameters:
        cbds - the data.
        subClass - the sub class.
        useCache - flag to use the cache.
        Returns:
        the content builder.

      • markDirty

        public void markDirty()
        Mark the content dirty. This only needed if you access the underlying data directly. If you use any of the getProperty and getLinkProperty methods, you do not need to call this method.

      • remapLegacyLink

        protected void remapLegacyLink(String oldProperty,
                               PE prop)
        Remaps a legacy link from the old property name to the new property.
        Parameters:

        prop - the new property.

        public void resetDirty()

      • setData

        public void setData(Enum purpose,
                    @Nullable
                    String newData,
                    @Nullable
                    URI xsd)
        Set arbitrary data. If the xsd is XsdConstants.XHTML_FRAGMENT_XSD then the data is automatically escaped for XML parsing.
        Parameters:
        purpose - the purpose.
        newData - the data. May be null.
        xsd - the XSD. May be null.

      • setData

                    String newData,
                    @Nullable
                    URI xsd)

        Parameters:
        purpose - the purpose.
        newData - the data. May be null.
        xsd - the XSD. May be null.

      • setTreatEmptyStringAsNull

        public void setTreatEmptyStringAsNull(boolean treatEmptyStringAsNull)
        Set the TreatEmptyStringAsNull flag. This means that properties set to empty string will be treated as if they were null. Defaults to true.

        treatEmptyStringAsNull - the TreatEmptyStringAsNull flag.
